description:
When we think about the things that impact health and illness we often think about health care professionals, treatments, hospitals and other aspects related to clinical care.

However, health is fundamentally impacted by many factors and things that are situated outside of health care settings. In this module, we will explore social and ecological determinants of health, health behaviours, and examine health and social care systems.

This module aims to equip students with a holistic overview of the myriad factors that shape individualâ€™s health and illness, enabling them to take a person-centred approach.
title: Social and Behavioural Determinants of Health
department: SSH School of Public Health Dean's Office
